direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods modify the collection by removing elements, though clear removes all elements while removeAll removes specific elements.
Both methods modify the collection by removing elements, though clear removes all elements while removeIf removes elements based on a condition.
Both methods modify the collection by removing elements, though clear removes all elements while retainAll removes elements not in the specified collection.
Both methods involve modifying the internal state of the composite collection, though clear removes all elements while removeComposited removes a specific collection.

enhanced_by.reason: Adding collections to the composite is necessary to set up the state before clearing it.
The clear method itself is the action that needs to be tested.
Verifying that the composite collection is empty after clearing it is a key assertion.
Checking the size of the composite collection after clearing it can also be a useful assertion.
